name: HOWL STAR
description:
Speedy checkpoint-based platformer!

A game made for the Mystic Western game jam with the secret ingredient "The Constellation".

Stars have fallen from the night sky, draw their energy and stick 'em back where they belong! Use your constellation based abilities on the way to navigate through the serene fantasy landscapes.

Music by .sinh (Zen Supremacy)

www.twitter.com/blueheatwave

www.chrisoboyle.tumblr.com
